Articles.Content: I just discovered (while trying to figure out RCS for the large capsule) that you can stick RCS tanks inside the large decouplers... This seems to make sense, but it also appears you can stick more than one numbers of them there and it does weird things to the ability to attach parts below it. Anybody know the details of this? Bug? Feature? Somewhere in between?

I think it\'s 'somewhere in between' - on some other thread someone posted about getting the new big parachute inside an asas module stacked on top of the command module, so I guess a few of the new parts still contain a bug where you can place them without stacking, and somehow not clip with other parts being placend on the stack.

Seems like a pretty good niche for exploits.

EDIT: It wasn\'t inside an asas module, it was inside a stack decoupler (which in turn had an asas on top)

EDIT 2: Or maybe it\'s just a bug with both of the decouplers?
If I had to guess I\'d think that fitting the parts inside the decouplers is intended but the lack of clipping isn\'t, though something is definitely odd about the way it happens even then.

Depending on what mods you\'re using, you can tuck a lot of things in a lot of places, if you really try.

The one thing I will say is this - don\'t put SAS modules inside anything else. Like, ever.
